attributes.action: Make Nigel Farage accountable for his actions on BREXIT as UK Ambassador to EU.

attributes.background: Nigel Farage and Co are authors in the narrative of BREXIT. Therefore this makes them EXPERTS in the field of BREXITING. They are also in possession of knowledge in how to take back control from EU.
